name: Beetles Plague
description:
Beetles Plague

This is my entry for the Comp-3 Gamejam with the topic "Bugs"!
I wish you a lot of fun defending the salad from the numerous bugs.

Everything is selfmade! Except the font - this was truely a challenge.

(Thematically I have of course also hidden a few involuntary bugs ;), which are likely to be remedied by restarting the game.)
